>    Was gonna get to him   ::Magmatron::       The door to his office slip
>open. Megatron stood there. (If that seems like a mode, look at the end)
>"Please come in and sit down. I am sorry about the state of disarray this
>place  is in. Too many things going on at once."   (About Megatron
>standing there. Dachande led him to  the door and then left, you never
>posted saying that Megs left, so one would  assume that he was still at
>the door.)

OOC: Dont worry, I dont have any problem about you making him be somewhere
speacial. And thanks for getting to him, I knew you would.

BIC: Megatron walked over to a chair and sat down, ignoring Magmatrons
comments. If things were in disaray, it proved Magmatron as a worthless
leader (not my opinion, not insulting you, Megatrons just full of himself).
"That is not my concern. I wish to bargain" he said abruptly.
